# [FEAT] Sentiment Analysis

## Labels
`ai`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement AI-powered sentiment analysis to detect customer emotions and urgency.

## Requirements

### Sentiment Detection
- Positive/Negative/Neutral classification
- Sentiment intensity scoring
- Emotion detection (frustration, satisfaction, etc.)
- Urgency indicators
- Escalation signals

### Real-time Analysis
- Analyze incoming messages
- Update on each reply
- Conversation trend tracking
- Sentiment timeline
- Alert on sentiment changes

### Integration Points
- Display on ticket
- Use in routing decisions
- Trigger workflows
- SLA adjustments
- Priority suggestions

### Agent Assistance
- Sentiment indicators in UI
- Response tone suggestions
- De-escalation prompts
- Positive interaction highlights

### Reporting
- Sentiment trends
- Sentiment by channel
- Sentiment by category
- Correlation with CSAT
- Agent sentiment impact

### Languages
- Multi-language support
- Language-specific models
- Accuracy per language

## Zendesk Reference
AI-driven insights through Intelligent Triage automatically detect sentiment and suggest resolutions.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Sentiment detection works
- [ ] Real-time updates
- [ ] Visual indicators present
- [ ] Workflow integration
- [ ] Multi-language support
